query: mutation(  $device_uuid: String!, $timezone: String!,  $device_token: String!,  $buffer_mins:Int!, $eveningLabel: String!,$eveningDow: Dows!,$eveningHr: Hours !, $eveningMin: Mins!) {upsert_schedule(timezone: $timezone,device_token: $device_token, device_uuid: $device_uuid, buffer_mins:$buffer_mins, entries: [{label: $eveningLabel,dow: $eveningDow, hr: $eveningHr, min: $eveningMin},] ){ id } }
